topInsights.title: Sync Dependencies Still Appearing
topInsights.description: 1 spec this week included 'schedule a meeting' language. This violates Async-First culture and causes delays.
topInsights.recommendation: Add async communication patterns to spec templates. Flag 'meeting', 'call', 'sync' keywords in spec review.

topInsights.title: Edge Cases Consistently Missing
topInsights.description: 2 out of 5 specs lacked explicit edge case handling. This leads to extra iteration cycles.
topInsights.recommendation: Add 'Edge Cases' as a required section in spec template. Prompt builders to consider: timeouts, empty states, error recovery.

topInsights.title: Clear Specs Ship Faster
topInsights.description: Specs scoring 90+ averaged 1 iteration. Specs below 80 averaged 4 iterations. Clarity directly impacts velocity.
topInsights.recommendation: Share Gold Standard patterns with all builders. Consider mandatory pattern checklist before spec submission.
